goals__remit: BritishAmerican Business is an exclusive corporate network and the voice of transatlantic business, dedicated to advancing economic growth for companies with operations in the US and UK. BAB offers strategic insights, introductions and marketing opportunities that help members to generate trade and new business and to power new ideas. In addition, we advocate for policies that help create a stable and thriving business climate in the transatlantic economy, in particular around the UK-US economic relationship.
